data.actual_result: The bot appears to be muted but the user can hear audio without any indication around the avatar.
data.expected_result: The bot should be muted and the user not able to hear anything from it.
data.short_description: Discord does not keep a bot muted after restart.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a channel with a bot constantly streaming audio- Right click the bot and mute it, not a server mute- Reload Discord after verifying the bot is muted and you cannot hear it
